list.name: Default Changelist
list.comment:
Verification Email was Done!,
How to use : 1. Post data to ( http://localhost:4000/signup ) with parameter : { "email" : "indrawanjonmuhamad@yahoo.com", "password" : "123akadsj23" } If success it will returned : { "result": true, "email": "indrawanjonmuhamad@yahoo.com" } 2. After that, you just open the email was we fill up before, and open the link, example ( http://localhost:3000/verification/5df9a04a9ada56239fc20451 ), if it's success it will appear text "Sukses verifikasi akun mu!" and if it's failed it will appear text "Ooppss Invalid Code Verification :("

task.summary: Fixed MongoClient Connection Error, but get 'undefined' and 3 Warnings
Separate Backend service into 2 Microservices ( Admin & Client ) Services
Separate Backend service into 2 Microservices ( Admin & Client ) Services (2)

Create select leader function in Client_Backend,
Endpoint = "http://localhost:5000/select_leader"
POST Data =
{ "code" : "5533", "select_leader" : "3", "event_id" : "5d4" }

Update Email Verification Feature
I do my own best to recover this accident, but for the least i can rewrite the code but unfortunately there is some error in Check Code Verification, and my estimate is among 85% - 90% for the completion the Feature

Verification Email was Done!,
How to use : 1. Post data to ( http://localhost:4000/signup ) with parameter : { "email" : "indrawanjonmuhamad@yahoo.com", "password" : "123akadsj23" } If success it will returned : { "result": true, "email": "indrawanjonmuhamad@yahoo.com" } 2. After that, you just open the email was we fill up before, and open the link, example ( http://localhost:3000/verification/5df9a04a9ada56239fc20451 ), if it's success it will appear text "Sukses verifikasi akun mu!" and if it's failed it will appear text "Ooppss Invalid Code Verification :("

MESSAGE.value: Fixed MongoClient Connection Error, but get 'undefined' and 3 Warnings
Fixed MongoClient Connection Error, but get 'undefined'
Separate Backend service into 2 Microservices ( Admin & Client ) Services
Separate Backend service into 2 Microservices ( Admin & Client ) Services (2)

Create select leader function in Client_Backend,
Endpoint = "http://localhost:5000/select_leader"
POST Data =
{ "code" : "5533", "select_leader" : "3", "event_id" : "5d4" }

Update Email Verification Feature
I do my own best to recover this accident, but for the least i can rewrite the code but unfortunately there is some error in Check Code Verification, and my estimate is among 85% - 90% for the completion the Feature
